  prototype={<>friend class <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a></>}

Iterator for <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a></code>s in a &#96;BasicBlock.

/ \\Returns an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">sandboxir::Instruction</a> &amp; when derereferenced. class BBIterator &#123; public: using difference&#95;type = std::ptrdiff&#95;t; using value&#95;type = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a>; using pointer = value&#95;type &#42;; using reference = value&#95;type &amp;; using iterator&#95;category = std::bidirectional&#95;iterator&#95;tag;

### swapOperands() {#a80cc7c4bd4a37fc13e9765fd3a31dbfe}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool BinaryOperator::swapOperands ()">
Exchange the two operands to this instruction.

This instruction is safe to use on any binary instruction and does not modify the semantics of the instruction. If the instruction cannot be reversed (ie, it&#39;s a Div), then return true.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h/#l00379">379</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h">InstrTypes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l02671">2671</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Create() {#a8f385eda0f71b4e8199b296fbc8e0da9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BinaryOperator &#42; BinaryOperator::Create (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#ac26154a24f393f523c87cc5f8239f36c">BinaryOps</a> Op, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; S1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; S2, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Name=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertposition">InsertPosition</a> InsertBefore=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Construct a binary instruction, given the opcode and the two operands.

Optionally (if InstBefore is specified) insert the instruction into a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> right before the specified instruction. The specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> is allowed to be a dereferenced end iterator.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h/#l00197">197</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h">InstrTypes.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l02639">2639</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
